rows.label: qst102210_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, what's with you...?
We're exhausted here.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0002
rows.name: You let everyone die again!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0003
rows.name:
Just like how you abandoned
mom and dad in Gula!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0004
rows.name: What are you talking about...?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0005
rows.name: Gula...?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0006
rows.name: Don't tell me... you're their...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0007
rows.name: I see... You've grown so much.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0008
rows.name: Nis... What is this about?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0009
rows.name:
He's right. I abandoned my
comrades again and was the
only one to survive.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0010
rows.name:
I don't know what happened in
the past, but you're not to blame
for what happened this time.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0011
rows.name:
Get out of here! Get out of my
sight and never come back!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0012
rows.name:
You're right... I might cause
another tragedy, like what
happened to Corden-san.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0013
rows.name:
What is all this, suddenly...? Hey,
what do you think I should do?

rows.label: qst102210_msg0014
rows.name: (What should I advise?)

rows.label: qst102210_msg0015
rows.name: Accept both of their opinions.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0016
rows.name:
Tell them to become a force
for good here together.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0101
rows.name: ...Alright. I'll leave.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0102
rows.name:
If I see you outside the village,
I'll use my dad's Blade to...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0103
rows.name: Yes... I don't mind if you do.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0104
rows.name:
If only I had died alone back then,
none of this would have happened.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0105
rows.name: Nis...!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0106
rows.name:
It's alright, Kathira... It was
a short time, but thank you.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0107
rows.name:
And to you all as well...
I doubt we'll meet again.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0108
rows.name:
In the end, I never got to hear
your stories about Vandham-san.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0109
rows.name:
But you're the ones
Vandham-san acknowledged.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0110
rows.name: I'm sure this isn't a mistake.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0111
rows.name: Well then...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0112
rows.name:
Now, all I have to do is grow
up and become a Driver!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0113
rows.name: One day, I'll get my revenge!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0114
rows.name:
Vandham... he always valued the
future more than the past.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0115
rows.name:
I suppose no one can say if
this was the right choice...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0201
rows.name:
You're the ones Vandham-san
acknowledged. I will follow your words.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0202
rows.name:
It won't be atonement, but from now on,
I intend to dedicate my life as a member
of the Hr√¶svelgr Mercenary Corps.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0203
rows.name: What?! But...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0204
rows.name:
Not asking about the past
was Vandham's way, but...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0205
rows.name:
Since you'll be living
together, you should have a
proper talk with this child.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0206
rows.name: I understand...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0207
rows.name: So that's what happened...

rows.label: qst102210_msg0208
rows.name:
...You shouldn't have
gone back to the camp.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0209
rows.name: Hey, you!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0210
rows.name: It's alright, Kathira. I think so too.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0211
rows.name:
Why won't you kick him out? I don't
get what you adults are thinking!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0212
rows.name:
...One day, I'll get my
revenge with my dad's Blade!

rows.label: qst102210_msg0213
rows.name:
I'm sure Vandham would
have done the same thing.

rows.label: qst102210_msg0214
rows.name: ...Thank you.
